verses.name: 1 Samuel 25:8
verses.text: Ask thy young men, and they will shew thee. Wherefore let the young men find favour in thine eyes: for we come in a good day: give, I pray thee, whatsoever cometh to thine hand unto thy servants, and to thy son David.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 25:9
verses.text: And when David’s young men came, they spake to Nabal according to all those words in the name of David, and ceased.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 25:10
verses.text: And Nabal answered David’s servants, and said, Who is David? and who is the son of Jesse? there be many servants now a days that break away every man from his master.
